<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Gets the waypoint loiter radius. Waypoint uses format [[Waypoint]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>  '''waypointLoiterRadius''' Waypoint

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> Waypoint: [[Waypoint]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value>  [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_radius = [[waypointLoiterRadius]] [groupOne, 1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[waypoints]], [[deleteWaypoint]], [[copyWaypoints]], [[setCurrentWaypoint]], [[setWaypointBehaviour]], [[setWaypointCombatMode]], [[setWaypointCompletionRadius]], [[setWaypointDescription]], [[setWaypointFormation]], [[setWaypointHousePosition]], [[setWaypointPosition]], [[setWaypointScript]], [[setWaypointSpeed]], [[setWaypointStatements]], [[setWaypointTimeout]], [[setWaypointType]], [[setWaypointVisible]], [[waypointAttachVehicle]], [[waypointAttachedVehicle]], [[setWaypointLoiterRadius]], [[addWaypoint]], [[setWaypointLoiterType]], [[currentWaypoint]], [[waypointSpeed]], [[setWPPos]]
</value></part></template>
